name: DuckShooting (DeathShadow)
description:
| DuckShooting |

It's a shooter game, you must shoot to the ducks and when you run out of ammo, you have to reload.

If you press the R button in the screen, you can reload and if you are playing from pc you can only press R

This is my first game and I hope you enjoy it!

- Michele Zanetti [DeathShadow]
